.ctp-button{color:#1d1d1d;background-color:#4693ff}body.theme-dark #challenge-success-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}body.theme-dark #challenge-error-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}body.theme-light{color:#313131;background-color:#fff}body.theme-light a{color:#0051c3}body.theme-light a:hover{color:#ee730a;text-decoration:underline}body.theme-light .lds-ring div{border-color:#595959 #0000 #0000}body.theme-light .font-red{color:#fc574a}body.theme-light .ctp-button{color:#fff;background-color:#003681;border-color:#003681}body.theme-light #challenge-success-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}body.theme-light #challenge-error-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}a{color:#0051c3;background-color:#0000;text-decoration:none;transition:color .15s}a:hover{color:#ee730a;text-decoration:underline}.main-content{width:100%;max-width:60rem;margin:8rem auto;padding-left:1.5rem;padding-right:1.5rem}.main-content .loading-verifying{height:76.391px}.spacer{margin:2rem 0}.spacer-top{margin-top:4rem}.spacer-bottom{margin-bottom:2rem}.heading-favicon{width:2rem;height:2rem;margin-right:.5rem}@media (width<=720px){.main-content{margin-top:4rem}.heading-favicon{width:1.5rem;height:1.5rem}}.main-wrapper{flex-direction:column;flex:1;align-items:center;display:flex}.font-red{color:#b20f03}.h1{font-size:2.5rem;font-weight:500;line-height:3.75rem}.h2{font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:500;line-height:2.25rem}.core-msg{font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:400;line-height:2.25rem}.body-text{font-size:1rem;font-weight:400;line-height:1.25rem}@media (width<=720px){.h1{font-size:1.5rem;line-height:1.75rem}.h2{font-size:1.25rem;line-height:1.5rem}.core-msg{font-size:1rem;line-height:1.5rem}}#challenge-error-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:contain;padding-left:34px}#challenge-success-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:contain;padding-left:42px}.text-center{text-align:center}.ctp-button{cursor:pointer;color:#fff;background-color:#0051c3;border:.063rem solid #0051c3;border-radius:.313rem;margin:2rem 0;padding:.375rem 1rem;font-size:.875rem;line-height:1.313rem;transition-property:background-color,border-color,color;transition-duration:.2s;transition-timing-function:ease}.ctp-button:hover{cursor:pointer;color:#fff;background-color:#003681;border-color:#003681}.footer{width:100%;max-width:60rem;margin:0 auto;padding-left:1.5rem;padding-right:1.5rem;font-size:.75rem;line-height:1.125rem}.footer-inner{border-top:1px solid #d9d9d9;padding-top:1rem;padding-bottom:1rem}.clearfix:after{clear:both;content:"";display:table}.clearfix .column{float:left;width:50%;padding-right:1.5rem}.diagnostic-wrapper{margin-bottom:.5rem}.footer .ray-id{text-align:center}.footer .ray-id code{font-family:monaco,courier,monospace}.core-msg,.zone-name-title{overflow-wrap:break-word}@media (width<=720px){.diagnostic-wrapper{flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:center;display:flex}.clearfix:after{display:initial;clear:none;text-align:center;content:none}.column{padding-bottom:2rem}.clearfix .column{float:none;word-break:keep-all;width:auto;padding:0}.zone-name-title{margin-bottom:1rem}}.loading-verifying{height:76.391px}.lds-ring{width:1.875rem;height:1.875rem;display:inline-block;position:relative}.lds-ring div{box-sizing:border-box;border:.3rem solid #0000;border-top-color:#313131;border-radius:50%;width:1.875rem;height:1.875rem;animation:1.2s cubic-bezier(.5,0,.5,1) infinite lds-ring;display:block;position:absolute}.lds-ring div:first-child{animation-delay:-.45s}.lds-ring div:nth-child(2){animation-delay:-.3s}.lds-ring div:nth-child(3){animation-delay:-.15s}@keyframes lds-ring{0%{transform:rotate(0)}to{transform:rotate(360deg)}}.rtl .heading-favicon{margin-left:.5rem;margin-right:0}.rtl #challenge-success-text{background-position:100%;padding-left:0;padding-right:42px}.rtl #challenge-error-text{background-position:100%;padding-left:0;padding-right:34px}.challenge-content .loading-verifying{height:76.391px}@media (prefers-color-scheme:dark){body{color:#d9d9d9;background-color:#222}body a{color:#fff}body a:hover{color:#ee730a;text-decoration:underline}body .lds-ring div{border-color:#999 #0000 #0000}body .font-red{color:#b20f03}body .ctp-button{color:#1d1d1d;background-color:#4693ff}body #challenge-success-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}body #challenge-error-text{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}}
